thread.title: Bernard Lewis: First-Rate Scholar and Wise Adviser

author: wsjcom
title: Bernard Lewis: First-Rate Scholar and Wise Adviser
text:
Regarding your editorial “Bernard Lewis” (May 21): Prof. Lewis deserved his reputation as the consummate student and historian of the Mideast, earning respect from both Arab and non-Arab followers for the deep understandings conveyed in his writings.
Recalling the post-9/11 words for which he is arguably most remembered—“Get tough or get out”—from his 2001 National Review piece, many consider him to be the primary outside source of advice that led the U.S. to invade Iraq. He later stated he was against the invasion, and while...
